abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews Kansas City Ballet's new production of dance piece Tom Sawyer, choreographed by William Whitener, at Kauffman Center for the Performing Arts in Kansas City, Mo.
snippet: Kansas City Ballet inaugurates its new home by adapting Twain’s classic in a new all-American work, “Tom Sawyer.”
lead_paragraph: Kansas City Ballet inaugurates its new home by adapting Twain’s classic in a new all-American work, “Tom Sawyer.”

headline.main: Yes, Those Are Tom, Becky and Huck Leaping
headline.print_headline: Yes, Those Are Tom, Becky and Huck Leaping
headline.seo: ‘Tom Sawyer’ by Kansas City Ballet - Review
